# The `ExitCodes.h` File Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This file contains definitions of exit codes for exit() function. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Included Headers

<IncludesList>
<IncludesListItem
  filePath="llvm/Config/llvm-config.h"
  permalink=""
  isLocal="true" />
</IncludesList>

## Description {#details}

This file contains definitions of exit codes for exit() function.

They are either defined by sysexits.h if it is supported, or defined here if sysexits.h is not supported.

The file content with the documentation metadata removed is:

<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#ifndef LLVM&#95;SUPPORT&#95;EXITCODES&#95;H</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#define LLVM&#95;SUPPORT&#95;EXITCODES&#95;H</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;llvm/Config/llvm-config.h&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#if HAVE&#95;SYSEXITS&#95;H</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &lt;sysexits.h&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#elif &#95;&#95;MVS&#95;&#95; || defined(&#95;WIN32)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &lt;sysexits.h&gt; does not exist on z/OS and Windows. The only value used in LLVM</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is EX&#95;IOERR, which is used to signal a special error condition (broken pipe).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Define the macro with its usual value from BSD systems, which is chosen to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// not clash with more standard exit codes like 1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#define EX&#95;IOERR 74</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#elif LLVM&#95;ON&#95;UNIX</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#error Exit code EX&#95;IOERR not available</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#endif</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#endif</span></CodeLine>
